TitleEnglish: Pretty Cure All Stars New Stage: Friends of the Future
SummaryEnglish: On her way home from school, Ayumi encounters a strange creature. After naming it Fuu-chan, Ayumi and the creature soon become good friends. However, Fuu-chan is actually a piece of Fusion, and holds the power of darkness. In an effort to make Ayumi happy, Fuu-chan swallows up everything that Ayumi dislikes, creating chaos in school and throughout the city!
Aliases: 映画　プリキュアオールスターズ NewStage みらいのともだち
